DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine change multiple cognitive skill complete 60 hour cognitive training ThinkRx , LearningRx program .
DOC.detailed_description: In two-phase randomized control study , investigator examine effect one-on-one cognitive training program memory , visual auditory processing , process speed , reason , attention , General Intellectual Ability ( GIA ) score student age 8-14 . In Phase 1 , participant randomly assign either experimental group complete 60 hour one-on-one cognitive train wait-list control group . In Phase 2 , wait-list control group complete intervention use alternative delivery model : 50 % clinician deliver 50 % digital delivery .
DOC.criteria: Between 814 year age , live great Colorado Springs area , screen GIA score 70 130
